com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common

Interface CloudRequest<T,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of response object.
    S - service defining the API.

    @Preamble(description="Generic cloud request definition")
public interface CloudRequest<T,S>
    Request definition.
